long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GroupVibe is a powerful Chrome browser extension that revolutionizes the way you watch YouTube videos together with friends. By seamlessly integrating with the GroupVibe Telegram bot, this extension allows you to automatically play videos added to your shared room, ensuring a synchronized and hassle-free viewing experience for everyone.

Key Features:
- Seamless integration with the GroupVibe Telegram bot
- Automatically play videos added to your shared room
- Real-time synchronization with the room's video queue
- Dynamic queue updates based on user voting and newly added videos
- Built-in voting system to prioritize videos democratically
- Clutter-free interface with a focus on video playback
- Easy navigation controls for a smooth viewing experience

How It Works:
1. Create a room using the GroupVibe Telegram bot and invite your friends
2. Install the GroupVibe Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store
3. Log in to the extension using your room ID and credentials
4. As users add videos to the room using the Telegram bot, the extension automatically adds them to the playback queue
5. The extension's built-in player starts playing videos from the queue in the order determined by the time of addition and user votes
6. If a user votes for a video or adds a new one during playback, the queue dynamically updates to reflect the changes
7. The extension constantly synchronizes with the room, ensuring that everyone is always watching the most up-to-date queue

With GroupVibe, you'll never have to argue about which videos to watch together again. The extension's seamless integration with the Telegram bot allows users to add and vote for videos using the familiar chat interface, while the browser extension takes care of the playback automatically. The dynamic queue system ensures that the most popular and newly added videos are given priority, creating a truly democratic viewing experience.

The built-in voting feature lets users upvote their favorite videos, influencing the order of playback. As votes come in and new videos are added, the queue automatically adjusts, keeping the viewing experience fresh and engaging. With real-time synchronization between the extension and the room, you can be sure that everyone is always on the same page, watching the same video at the same time.

Requirements:
- Google Chrome web browser
- GroupVibe Telegram bot room ID and login credentials

Experience the future of watching videos together with GroupVibe. Install the Chrome extension today and enjoy seamless integration with the GroupVibe Telegram bot for a truly collaborative and enjoyable video watching experience!
